attributes.action: Make vaccines manufacturers liable again like that if they give us false data
attributes.additional_details: Because I want the manufacturers for vaccines to take responsibility for their actions .
attributes.background: I want the parliament to reinstate vaccines manufacturers to be liable for missing data false information about vaccines and to be liable for their vaccines and prospects

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You might like to sign the following petition:

Ban rollout of vaccines where manufacturer has been indemnified from liability
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564743
